name: 🎓🐾 SMU PAW Animal Day
description: Catch us at SMU PAW Animal Day and meet our adoptable cats from Love Kuching Project! 🐱🎉
whatToExpect: 🐾 Cat adoption drive with Love Kuching Project
💬 Learn more about cat care and volunteering
cta: Don't miss out! Drop by to meet our furry friends and learn how you can help. 🐾❤️

name: 🏡🐶 Brickland Pets’ Day
description: Join us for a pawsome day of adoptions, games, and learning! 🐾🐕🐈
whatToExpect: 🐱 Meet cats up for adoption in Kitty Bon Bon
🎁 Lucky Draws & over 40 booths to explore!
cta: 🎟️ Entry just $5! Includes a goodie bag, photobooth & lucky draw. Come support and have fun!

name: 🏫 Nan Hua High School Talk
description: Sharing about cat welfare, rescue, and how students can make a difference 🐾🎓
whatToExpect: 🐱 Real stories from our rescue cats
🙋‍♀️ Q&A session with the Love Kuching team
cta: 📣 Inspiring the next generation of animal lovers! ❤️

name: 🌙🐱 Purrsa Malam: Feline Nights & Market Lights
description: Suppawt, shop & play at our most purr-fect night market event! 🐾🛍️
whatToExpect: 🏡 Visit our cozy cattery and meet our senior cats 💗
cta: 🎟️ $10 to visit the cattery — goes directly to vet bills & cat care! Limited slots, register now! 🐾

name: 🎉 Nee Soon Pets Fiesta
description: Throwback to a wonderful day of fun, fundraising, and even meeting the PM! 🐾🇸🇬
whatToExpect: 🤝 Meet fellow animal lovers and learn about our mission
cta:
Couldn’t join us? You can still support via
💰 PayNow (UEN: T13SS0220G) or DBS 0279076550
🛒 Food/litter via Polypet/Rein Biotech! ❤️

name: 🌳🐾 Cashew Pets Day
description: A sweet day in the West featuring our superstar senior cat, Unker AB! 🐱🎩
whatToExpect: 🐾 Learn about palliative care through Unker AB
cta: 💖 Missed us? You can still donate via PayNow UEN T13SS0220G or DBS 0279076550, or send food/litter via links in our bio!

name: 🎪 Singapore Cat Festival
description: We’re boothing at the biggest cat event of the year! 😻🐾
whatToExpect: 🆕 Launch of LKP Cat Stickers & LKP.png Tote Bags
🙌 Meet our team and learn how to support our cats
cta: 🐱 Visit us in the Animal Welfare Group section to suppawt, shop, and learn more about our work!
